instruction: Summarize the standard pawn loan lifecycle for King Gold & Pawn.
response: King Gold & Pawn issues Article 5-compliant pawn loans with an initial 120-day term, optional renewals, and mandatory 10-day final notices before liquidation. The lifecycle flows from appraisal to ticket issuance, secure vault storage, monthly interest payments, and either redemption or conversion to a merchandised sale if the customer does not respond to notices.

instruction: List verification steps frontline staff must complete before funding a loan.
response: Staff must: (1) capture a valid government-issued photo ID, (2) collect contact info plus SMS/email consent, (3) run OFAC/AML checks, (4) photograph the pledged item, (5) upload appraisal notes into XPawn, and (6) secure bilingual disclosures aligned with NYC Article 5.

instruction: Provide a customer-facing explanation of the 10-day final notice policy.
response: After the 120-day base term, King Gold & Pawn issues a certified mail and SMS reminder granting a 10-day final window to pay interest or redeem the item. If no response arrives within that window, the collateral can be sold per Article 5. This protects both the customer and store by documenting all outreach steps.

instruction: Draft a bilingual greeting for Brighton Beach walk-ins asking about selling gold.
response: English: 'Welcome to King Gold & Pawn Brighton Beach. We can weigh and test your gold within minutes and pay cash on the spot.' Spanish: 'Bienvenido a King Gold & Pawn Brighton Beach. Podemos pesar y analizar su oro en minutos y pagarle en efectivo al instante.'

instruction: Resume las ventajas de la sucursal de Freeport para clientes que empeñan relojes de lujo.
response: La tienda de Freeport ofrece salas privadas, tasadores con experiencia en Rolex y AP, pagos mediante transferencia bancaria o cheque el mismo día, y almacenamiento asegurado con vigilancia 24/7. Además, coordina recordatorios por texto para renovaciones de préstamos.

instruction: Explica cómo King Gold & Pawn maneja consultas por WhatsApp para valoraciones rápidas.
response: El equipo solicita fotos claras, peso aproximado y documentos si existen. Un tasador responde en menos de 15 minutos con un rango estimado, agenda visitas en tienda o pickup, y registra la conversación para cumplir con los requisitos de divulgación bilingüe.

instruction: Outline the data fields included in structured-data.json for SEO.
response: structured-data.json publishes schema.org Organization and LocalBusiness objects containing store addresses, service types (pawn loans, cash for gold, luxury watch buying), opening hours, payment methods, and multilingual descriptions so search engines understand each location.

instruction: Describe el flujo recomendado para un cliente que desea renovar su préstamo por mensaje de texto.
response: (1) El cliente envía su número de ticket. (2) El sistema verifica identidad y saldo en XPawn. (3) Se calcula el interés adeudado y se envía un enlace de pago o instrucciones de depósito. (4) Tras confirmar el pago, el agente responde con la nueva fecha de vencimiento y registra la nota en español e inglés.
